name: Add new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from Interact quiz submissions
description:
Every time a new Interact quiz with lead data is submitted, a new row will be added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template works with [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XZz02JergSkzNou9Cx850-3Edy4ExVuGOsAGyeA-Pvg/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template expects your Interact quiz to have these fields:
1) First Name
2) Last Name
3) Email
